text: Gyrocaryum is a genus of plant in family Boraginaceae.Tropicos.org. Missouri Botanical Garden. 29 Dec 2016 It contains a single species, Gyrocaryum oppositifolium, which is endemic to Spain. ==Distribution== Its natural habitats are Mediterranean Matorral shrubland, and temperate bunchgrass- grassland. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Boraginoideae Category:Monotypic asterid genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Boraginaceae genera
title: Gyrocaryum
